about_the_game:
Upgrade your SPACE/MECH/PILOT experience to the DELUXE with SPACE / MECH / PILOT - THE UNIVERSE DRIVE!


If you're interested in supporting the future development of S/M/P content, then please consider offering your valuable dollars towards THE S/M/P INITIATIVE'S fund!

This includes the following:
  • SPACE / MECH / PILOT: art folder - The game's digital artbook, included as a PDF! See a whopping 28 pages worth of art featuring concept art and final art from both L0VEBREAK (Character Artist) and Sophia Debons-Ricard (Lead Artist).
  • SPACE / MECH / PILOT: THE PROTOTYPE FILES - Includes a prototype build of the game made during early development of SPACE/MECH/PILOT, plus documentation/images of select builds from the game.
  • SPACE / MECH / PILOT: images folder - Get several high quality desktop/social media backgrounds/banners and icons!

To access these files, right click the game, select Manage -> Browse Local Files and find the "DLC" folder.

* The soundtrack is available as its own DLC:


You can purchase the soundtrack and DLC together with SPACE / MECH / PILOT - THE UNIVERSE DRIVE + OST bundle.

If you're interested in supporting the future development of S/M/P content, then please consider offering your valuable dollars towards THE S/M/P INITIATIVE'S fund!

This includes the following:
  • SPACE / MECH / PILOT: art folder - The game's digital artbook, included as a PDF! See a whopping 28 pages worth of art featuring concept art and final art from both L0VEBREAK (Character Artist) and Sophia Debons-Ricard (Lead Artist).
  • SPACE / MECH / PILOT: THE PROTOTYPE FILES - Includes a prototype build of the game made during early development of SPACE/MECH/PILOT, plus documentation/images of select builds from the game.
  • SPACE / MECH / PILOT: images folder - Get several high quality desktop/social media backgrounds/banners and icons!

To access these files, right click the game, select Manage -> Browse Local Files and find the "DLC" folder.

* The soundtrack is available as its own DLC:


You can purchase the soundtrack and DLC together with SPACE / MECH / PILOT - THE UNIVERSE DRIVE + OST bundle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A functional one. You've got that, right?
  • Additional Notes: Need a PDF reader of some kind to access the Artbook and Dev Notes.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
